title: Large Rowhouse Apartment......'steps' to University of Bridgeport
app_fee: $40.00 application fee- credit, criminal background check, eviction history
posting_body: ['A Magnificent Property', 'AVAILABLE TO "MOVE IN" ::: AUGUST 15th +/-', 'Classic & Fully Restored & Renovated Late 19Th', 'C.', 'Tri-Level Brownstone W/Modern Amenities but Retaining Its Original Classic Charm!', 'THIS PROPERTY FEATURES:::', '-6 Rooms, 3 Bedrooms, 3.5 Bathrooms', '-2,000 square feet apartment', '1st LEVEL-', 'Kitchen, Dining Room, Living Room, 1/2 Bathroom, Laundry Closet', '2nd LEVEL-', '2 Bedrooms, 2 Full Bathrooms', '3rd LEVEL- 1 Bedroom, 1 Full Bathroom, access to rooftop deck', '-Every Bedroom has its own Bathroom', '-Large entry foyer with French Doors into living room with gorgeous Fireplace, which is open to spacious Dining Room with exposed brick wall.', '-New Kitchen: updated/ fully Applianced with new cabinets & appliances & convenient half Bath located off kitchen.', '-Up the staircase to the middle level of home with gorgeous original hand carved woodwork features 2 spacious Bedrooms both with full en-suite baths & dynamite closet space.', "-On the upper level houses the large Master suite with full bath, large Closet space with access to amazing 'Rooftop Deck' with panoramic views of Long Island Sound / Seaside Park", '-Great rear custom hardscaped Patio area', '-On street Parking', 'Close to Harbor Yard, Hartford Healthcare Amphitheater, Total Mortgage Arena.....', 'Short Walk To University Of Bridgeport, Port Jefferson Ferry & Completely Renovated Seaside Park To Enjoy A Beautiful Stroll Along The Water', 'To Relax and Enjoy!', 'Tenant pays: gas, electric, renters insurance,', '$40 application fee', '1 year minimum Lease', 'CONTACT :::', 'Jack Gregory ~ Realtor', 'Cell: #203-545-6353', '~ or ~', 'Jack', '@Lmmre,com', 'Levey Miller Maretz, LLC', '1768 Litchfield Turnpike', 'Woodbridge, CT 06525', 'Office:  #203-389-5377', 'WWW.LMMRE.COM']
